sqlMap.select: select QUERY_LOOKUP_PARAM_ID, PARAM_NAME, QUERY_LOOKUP_ID from QUERY_LOOKUP_PARAM where QUERY_LOOKUP_PARAM_ID = #id#
sqlMap.insert: insert into QUERY_LOOKUP_PARAM (QUERY_LOOKUP_PARAM_ID, PARAM_NAME, QUERY_LOOKUP_ID) values (#id#, #paramName#, #queryLookup.id#)
sqlMap.update: update QUERY_LOOKUP_PARAM set PARAM_NAME = #paramName#, QUERY_LOOKUP_ID = #queryLookup.id# where QUERY_LOOKUP_PARAM_ID = #id#
